text: No worries. No cares. Just float and wait for the wind to blow you around. Everybody needs a friend. Let that brush dance around there and play.
Be brave. I think there's an artist hidden in the bottom of every single one of us. All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.
La- da- da- da- dah. Just be happy. Now let's put some happy little clouds in here. We'll do another happy little painting.
Let your heart take you to wherever you want to be. Let's make some happy little clouds in our world.
Brown is such a nice color.

Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do anything. We might as well make some Almighty mountains today as well, what the heck. Steve wants reflections, so let's give him reflections.
God gave you this gift of imagination. Use it. Let your imagination just wonder around when you're doing these things.
It's a good way of getting rid of all your anxieties and hostilities.

In nature, dead trees are just as normal as live trees. Each highlight must have it's own private shadow. If it's not what you want - stop and change it. Don't just keep going and expect it will get better.
